docTitle.name: shortTitle
docTitle.content: Exemption from Profits Tax (Debt Instrument Issued by Mainland Local People’s Government at Any Level) Order

section.name: s2
section.heading: Interpretation
section.def: Mainland (內地) means any part of China other than Hong Kong, Macau and Taiwan;
MLPG debt instrument (地方人民政府債務票據) means a debt instrument issued in Hong Kong by a local people’s government at any level in the Mainland.

subsection.leadIn: A person is exempt from the payment of profits tax chargeable under Part 4 of the Ordinance in respect of sums received by, or accrued to, the person as—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: interest paid or payable on a MLPG debt instrument;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: profits on the sale, or other disposal, of a MLPG debt instrument; or

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: profits on the redemption, on maturity or presentment, of a MLPG debt instrument.

subsection.content: This section applies in relation to profits tax chargeable for any year of assessment commencing on or after 1 April 2022.
